name: AllegroRPG
description:
Lead your party into battle, survive 30 turns and defeat all enemy waves to win! But there’s no time to waste, so make your decisions with haste!

You have ten seconds every turn, to make your move, before the enemy strikes! 

Control three characters : Soldier, Valkyrie, and Nurse , that each move across the grid and use one of their abilities to strike back each turn. 

Also mind that the enemies might move out or into your attacks. ;)

Abilities:
Every character has three abilities and their first one is always move 2 spaces.

Soldier - Shoot (deal 2 damage on tile same row or column),
                Grenade (deal 3 damage on tile, restricted square range)
Valkyrie - Heavy Bash (deal 3 damage adjacent or diagonal),
                  Switch Strike (deal 2 damage and switch places with tile)
Nurse - Poison Dart (apply 1 poison (damage every turn)),
              Heal/Cure (heal for 3 and cure poison on tile, heal all friends for 1)

Controls : 
Arrow keys - Move cursor
X/V - Select
Z/C - Cancel

Credits :
DrSmey - Programming, Design, Sounds 
Noctiluca - Art, Design 

This game was made for Ludum Dare 51
